summary: I am a driven communications professional with 11 years of experience in corporate and project communications, and project management. I am result-oriented and interested in providing creative solutions to strategic and operational challenges. I am highly versatile, proactive and eager to be part of a dynamic and fast-paced environment which requires a structured approach to work and a desire for making a meaningful change in people's lives. I care about health and I am interested in technological innovation applied for the improvement of brain health specifically.

education.field_of_study: International Relations: Global Culture and Politics
International Studies: European Studies with French Language
Mathematics and Computer Science with English Language

certifications.name: Framing Your Communication to Inspire and Convince

profile_positions.description:
Oncode Accelerator is a public-private initiative which aims to innovate and accelerate the development of new cancer therapies by placing cancer patients at the core of preclinical therapy development. This is realized through the power of three innovation platforms: Patient Cohorts, Organoids and Artificial Intelligence. Over 30 partners leverage the full potential of the Dutch innovation ecosystem by building development pipelines for four of the most common types of cancer therapies: Small Molecules, Biologics, Cell and Gene Therapies, and Therapeutic Vaccines. Our world-class toolbox of state-of-the-art technologies will result in more effective, personalized cancer therapies. This will bring us closer to our overarching vision: outsmarting cancer, impacting lives. 

Find out more: www.oncodeaccelerator.nl
profile_positions.title: Senior Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
Lygature is a not-for-profit organization that aims to accelerate the development of new medical solutions for patients by driving public-private collaboration between academia, industry and society. Born out of the merger in 2015 of TI Pharma and CTMM, Lygature combines in-depth knowledge and experience in the areas of drug development and medical technology. This combined expertise gives Lygature the ability to collaborate in complex projects and foster innovation in the field of personalized health.

Tasks and Responsibilities: 
* Developing Communication and Dissemination strategies and implementing project action plans.
* Strategic execution of corporate communication with a focus on improvement of internal communication, employer branding and external positioning.
* Managing the creation of project materials and delivering communication and dissemination activities for the Innovative Medicines Initiative-funded projects:

RADAR-AD project: https://www.radar-ad.org/ 
RADAR-CNS project: https://www.radar-cns.org/
APPROACH project: https://www.approachproject.eu/
PD-MIND project: https://www.pd-mind.org/
PERSIST-SEQ project: https://persist-seq.org/
EPND project: https://epnd.org/
profile_positions.title: Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
MBM Training and Development Center is a consultancy and adult training provider, working in the UK and Europe-wide. Our method of delivery includes contract training, seminars, non-credit classes and a variety of consulting services. We can design programs tailored to meet your school's or company’s needs. We work with enterprises to build sustainable growth by integrating strategy development, innovation capabilities, and new growth initiatives. Along the way, we put into action proven models for organising, learning, testing and re-imagining the future of your business.

Tasks and Responsibilities
* Project-planning, coordination and management of training activities
* Delivering intellectual outputs and strategising on project-related tasks
* Managing human resources and delegating responsibilities
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
The Hague Peace Projects is a collective of young professionals who act as catalysts for peace all over the world. We bring together diaspora communities from conflict areas living in Europe, local journalists and human rights actors living and working in conflict areas. We empower people to reconstruct their motivation and skills to deal with conflicts peacefully, using a wide range of tools such as research, advocacy, education, cultural events and media. Together we aim to contribute to building well-informed, resilient, vocal, globally connected and inclusive civil societies in areas affected by conflict and oppression, capable of realising nonviolent social and political transformation.

Tasks and Responsibilities: 
* facilitation and support of the planning, implementation, follow-up and reporting of events
* delivering content on the website and social media pages
* strategising on improvement of outreach and quality of communication channels
* creation of press releases, annual reports, newsletters and fundraising campaigns
* compiling of press list and researching press relations
* promotion of events on social media: Instagram, Twitter and Facebook
profile_positions.title: Communications Officer

profile_positions.description:
The Consultancy project "Way In: Unlocking the Human Potential of Refugees in Europe" sought to tackle the issue of wasted human potential from disenfranchised demographics through the achievement of different strategic steps in building a collaborative platforms that mitigate the effects of slow and inefficient integration processes. The project developed a strategy which creates a mutually advantageous situation between refugees/migrants as employment seekers and businesses through the creation of relevant services bundled together in a digital portal, systematic re-skilling and job matching that work to ensure migrants’ and refugees’ long-term career development and self-realisation. The project presented a trusted and cooperative employment network that produces meaningful professional paths for those migrants and refugees whose skills and educational backgrounds are in danger of wastage on the Austrian labor market and in the city of Vienna in particular.

Tasks and Responsibilities: 
* researching political factors impacting migrants’ integration on the labor market in Europe
* country profiling and categorisation according to analysis of national political climate and migrant situation
profile_positions.title: Consultant

company.name: Euro-Mediterranean Center for Cross Cultural Dialogue

profile_positions.company: Euro-Mediterranean Center for Cross Cultural Dialogue
profile_positions.description:
EMCCCD is the first youth organisation with Euro-Mediterranean focus, registered in Greece. It aims at promoting the concept of dialogue at three levels, namely - inter-civilisational, inter-cultural and inter-religious dialogue. EMCCCD works towards diversity management, social cohesion and social inclusion. It addresses the need of creating new instruments to value market and non-market benefits of diversity and integrate diversity considerations into policy-making. 

Tasks and Responsibilities: 
* event-planning, coordination and promotion of project activities
* organising and implementing youth projects on youth migration in the European and the Mediterranean Region
* managing human resources in the organisation
* facilitation and reimbursement of travels for intercultural teams
* creation of narrative and financial annual project reports
profile_positions.title: Communications Manager

company.name: Bulgarian Network for Human Rights Education

profile_positions.company: Bulgarian Network for Human Rights Education
profile_positions.description:
BNHRE is the first national network for human rights education in Bulgaria. It comprises educational institutions - schools, university departments, associations for youth training and adult education, individual members and educational experts. BNHRE develops and delivers training programs in non-formal human rights education to various groups at risk, both in Bulgaria and internationally. Additionally, it is specialised in implementation of human rights monitoring and lobbying, human rights research and analyses of human rights legislation, implementation of short and long-term human rights trainings and adult learning programs.

Task and Responsibilities: 
* coordinating youth projects on topics spanning human rights education, LGBTQI rights and environmental rights in particular, gender equality and gender mainstreaming, social inclusion of disadvantaged groups and disabled people
* creation of content for website, updating and editing existing information
* event-planning, promotion, facilitation and organisation of projects such as local and international training courses, awareness-raising campaigns, youth seminars and summer schools
* creation of narrative and financial reports
profile_positions.title: Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
CESIE is a European centre of studies and initiatives, inspired by the work and theories of sociologist Danilo Dolci (1924-1997), who developed innovative educational non-violent methods. CESIE delivers research on social needs and challenges by making use of innovative learning approaches to answer to these needs. In this way, CESIE actively connects research with action through the use of formal and non-formal learning methodologies. We do believe that education nourishes economic growth. Therefore, education promotes individual wellbeing as well as economic development of societies by stimulating innovation and entrepreneurship.

Task and Responsibilities: 
* implementing local projects on the promotion of multiculturalism and the fostering of intercultural dialogue, supported by the European Commission, in UBNTU – International cultural centre for North-African immigrants
* leading, managing and conducting peer-to-peer educational activities in CE.S.I.E. on Human Trafficking prevention, Human Rights education and Social inclusion
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Marketing Research Institute is a consultancy company which provides market intelligence in the form of a detailed and systematic analysis of market trends, opportunities and conditions tailored for business projects of individuals and companies seeking to create competitive and efficient market deliverables. 

Task and Responsibilities: 
* preparation and assessment of marketing and sociological research projects
* delivering market field research on trends and conditions of sales of products and services
* conduction of qualitative and quantitative analysis of project database
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

company.name: Euro-Mediterranean Network for Youth Trafficking Prevention

profile_positions.company: Euro-Mediterranean Network for Youth Trafficking Prevention
profile_positions.description:
EMNYTP is the first Euro-Mediterranean partnership dealing with prevention of trafficking of young people. It is composed of non-governmental organisations, governmental institutions, and individuals from around the world. EMNYTP recognises that the challenge to provide adequate programs on youth trafficking prevention requires concerted cooperation among non-governmental groups and organisations, national ministries and departments of education, and other governmental institutions. It is the only initiative in the region that provides a platform for cooperation, exchange of ideas, support for project development and databases with educational resources and experts on youth trafficking prevention.

Tasks and Responsibilities: 
* organising and delivering peer-to-peer education and training activities aimed at prevention of Human Trafficking in the form of awareness-raising campaigns, flashmobs, study sessions and (international) training courses

Based in The Hague, The Netherlands, Timebank.cc is a Community Currency, accessible to everyone, to share skills and knowledge. Trade services with other Timebankers in exchange for time instead of conventional money. One Timebank Hour equals exactly one hour of work.
